title: Patrick Corrigan
subtitle:
At launch of new NI research on public attitudes to immigration & refugees.

title: Choose Love / Help Refugees
subtitle:
We all need to take action.

Parliament has voted to scrap legislation enabling lone refugee children in Europe to be reunited with their families in the UK after Brexit. 

This will leave children who should be with their families stranded, alone and at risk of harm. (1/2) pic.twitter.com/vGwvHqQ2w7

title: George Roussos
subtitle: Catastrophic conditions greet refugees arriving on #Lesbos - Since the beginning of the year over 1,300 people have arrived on the Aegean islands. There have been fatal accidents; just this week several children drowned off the Turkish coast https://www.theguardian.com/global-development/2020/jan/16/catastrophic-conditions-greet-refugees-arriving-on-lesbos … #RefugeeCrisispic.twitter.com/Azr0ygG30M

title: Micro Rainbow
subtitle: Did you know? Every month we support newly granted #LGBTI #refugees with accessing Universal Credit, employability training and much more. Starting a life in the UK can be overwhelming. title: NACCOM
subtitle:
"We are all human beings. I have my dreams." 

Thousands of people going through the asylum process each year are left isolated & destitute because of a broken system. We're working with our 110 UK member charities to #EndDestitution amongst those seeking asylum & refugees. pic.twitter.com/5fR2wmpVhU

title: Dr. Ben Watson
subtitle: Many politicians are busy saying that fewer refugees with us means more help in the immediate area. Now, new figures show that fewer refugees in Europe have NOT necessarily meant more humanitarian aid in the surrounding areas. In 2018, there was an 8% drop in humanitarian aid. pic.twitter.com/FJ7FJN3RSd

title: Dr. Ben Watson
subtitle: We are really happy today. The Danish Refugee Council and the Red Cross have just been granted a 4-year extension of the integration project "Friends Shows the Way".
